item.title: Talks
item.description: Sometimes I talk about Identity and Access Management, Information Security, and how to do stuff: SINC MidWest Security Leaders Forum 2018 - Chicago, IL From 0 to zero trust with Okta CISO ExecNET Roundtable 2018 - Dallas, TX Manage Cloud Risk with Identity-driven Security Oktane 2018 - Las Vegas, NV Implement the Okta LDAP Interface Oktane 2017 Protect your Modern API OAuth Oracle OpenWorld (2014 ˜ 2016) - San Francisco, CA Build your own Application Using Oracle Identity Cloud Services (IDCS) Oracle University: Cloud Security Seminar Oracle University: Oracle Identity Governance Compliance Workshop ISSA: CISSP Seminars (2011 ~ 2012) - São Paulo, SP Information Security and Risk Management Application Security

item.title: Oi, I'm Frederico
item.description: I am Brazilian I live in the Bay Area, CA I like beer, soccer, and good music I write code and sometimes I talk about security I spent 10+ years implementing security in 70+ customers I am the Product Mkt Manager for Protocols and API at Okta I work with a lot of awesome people disrupting the IAM industry I have a LinkedIn profile in case you’re into details

item.title: Olá Mundo!
item.description: Criei este post somente para dar sorte :D. Caso você tenha traduzido isto para o inglês, meus parabéns.
